# isEnabled

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the large content viewer is enabled on the device.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var isEnabled: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

It isn’t necessary to check this value before adding a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILargeContentViewerInteraction] to a view, but it may be helpful if you need to adjust the behavior of coexisting gesture handlers. For example, a button with a long press handler might increase its long press duration so the user can read the text in the large content viewer first.

## Detecting the large content viewer

- **enabledStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification the system posts when it enables or disables the large content viewer.
